|rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = |rad2modif = Mini PCI |rad2chip1 = Atheros;AR9220; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== There appears to be a USB flash drive attached to the main board
in the FCC photos, presumably for the main firmware storage. *"2976432401" is silkscreened on one wireless module in the FCC photos. *"2976432501" is silkscreened on the other wireless module. :AR9220 is the (highly) probable chip used for :256MB RAM? The FCC sample label indicates that the internal model for this device is DRAGON-AP-R. ==Links of Interest== [http://www.xirrus.com/Products/Wireless-Arrays/XR-Series/XR-500 Product page XR-500 series] [[Category:English Documentation]]
